hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Check if published version is already present in repo sudo zypper update -y package_name="joomla" published_version="3.8.6"
#Check distro and available version in repo : ubuntu available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2)
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y apache2 apache2-devel tar wget mariadb gcc gcc-c++ libtool autoconf make pcre pcre-devel libxml2 libxml2-devel libexpat-devel wget libjpeg-devel libpng-devel unzip net-tools libmcrypt libmcrypt-devel
# Build and Install PHP wget http://www.php.net/distributions/php-5.6.8.tar.gz tar xvzf php-5.6.8.tar.gz cd php-5.6.8 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php --with-apxs2=/usr/sbin/apxs2 --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/php --with-mysql --with-gd --with-zlib --with-mcrypt make sudo make install export PATH=/usr/local/php/bin/:$PATH
#Make Changes in the configuration files sudo chmod 777 /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo cp /etc/apache2/httpd.conf /etc/apache2/httpd.conf.old sudo chmod 777 /etc/apache2/httpd.conf.old
#/etc/apache2/httpd.conf echo -e "AddType application/x-httpd-php .php" | sudo tee -a /etc/apache2/httpd.conf echo -e "<Directory />" | sudo tee -a /etc/apache2/httpd.conf echo -e " DirectoryIndex index.php " | sudo tee -a /etc/apache2/httpd.conf echo -e "</Directory>" | sudo tee -a /etc/apache2/httpd.conf echo -e "LoadModule php5_module /usr/lib64/apache2/libphp5.so" | sudo tee -a /etc/apache2/httpd.conf
diff -u /etc/apache2/httpd.conf.old /etc/apache2/httpd.conf || true cat /etc/apache2/httpd.conf
#Source Code cd /srv/www/htdocs sudo rm -rf Joomla sudo mkdir Joomla cd Joomla sudo wget -O Joomla_3.8.6-Stable-Full_Package.zip https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/releases/download/3.8.6/Joomla_3.8.6-Stable-Full_Package.zip sudo unzip Joomla_3.8.6-Stable-Full_Package.zip sudo chmod a+w /srv/www/htdocs/Joomla/
#Rename configuration.php-dist as configuration.php sudo mv installation/configuration.php-dist installation/configuration.php
#mysql sudo /usr/bin/mysql_install_db --user=mysql sudo /usr/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql & sleep 50
sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create database Joomla" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create user 'user'@'localhost' identified by 'password'" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'user'@'localhost' identified by 'password'" sudo /usr/sbin/httpd -D BACKGROUND
wget http://127.0.0.1:80/Joomla/installation/index.php
